org.jpedal.examples.viewer.gui.swing

Class SwingMouseListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jpedal.examples.viewer.gui.MouseSelector
      • org.jpedal.examples.viewer.gui.swing.SwingMouseListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MouseListener, MouseMotionListener, MouseWheelListener, EventListener, GUIMouseHandler

    public class SwingMouseListener
extends MouseSelector
implements GUIMouseHandler, MouseListener, MouseMotionListener, MouseWheelListener
    Class to handle Swing Mouse Events that take place on the Pane which holds the PDF content (PdfDecoder).

      void allowMouseCoordsUpdate()
